posts.post_title: F/S t206 Frank Chance Portrait Yellow SGC 84
posts.post_content: Selling a T206 Frank Chance Yellow Portrait SGC 84 {Endicott N.Y. Find} with a Sweet Caporal 350 back for $1995. shipped. Will accept paypal through f/f or postal money order. Email me at [url]brodcards@aol.com[/url] for scans. Thank you.
